isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR ELECTRIC WINDOW AND DOOR LOCK SWITCH

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR ELECTRIC WINDOW AND DOOR LOCK SWITCH

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Electric Window and Door Lock Switch on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 64
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Connect both wiring harness connectors (Item 6) to the cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1), driver side shown.

Once both wiring harness connectors (Item 6) are connected to the cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1), push wiring harness into opening in cab door trim panel (Item 5), driver side shown.

With the wiring harness properly positioned inside cab door trim panel (Item 5), position cab door electric window and door lock switch (Item 1) into the opening of cab door trim panel and push it down until the spring retaining clips (Item 4) secure it in place, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door electric window and door lock switch.
